statement.p: In 42.22 of the last 45 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{45}}={0.4222}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{45}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4222}\cdot{45}={18.999}. We round that as requested to 19 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
